text: The Sheltering Desert is a 1992 South African British Irish adventure drama movie directed by Regardt van den Bergh and starring Jason Connery, Rupert Graves, Joss Ackland, Kate Normington, John Carson. == Other websites == * Category:1992 adventure movies Category:1992 drama movies Category:South African adventure movies Category:South African drama movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British drama movies Category:Irish adventure movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies directed by Regardt van den Bergh
title: The Sheltering Desert
